check.cantUseSkillRecquired: no se puede utilizar sin 1 adición en la habilidad requerida.
check.cantUseUntrained: no se puede utilizar sin entrenar (mínimo 1 adición).
check.cantUseRealityWhileDisconnected: No puedes utilizar la capacidad de la realidad mientras estés desconectado.
check.interactionNeedTarget: No se puede intentar la prueba de ataque de interacción sin un objetivo. Selecciona un objetivo e inténtalo de nuevo.
check.isApprovedAction: Successful Approved Action (draw a destiny card)
check.needTarget: No se puede realizar una tirada avanzada sin objetivo. Selecciona objetivo y prueba de nuevo.
check.noTracker: Cannot use chase button unless there is an active combat in the combat tracker.

chatText.notPermittedDSR: Next DSR step {step} not permitted by Drama Card
chatText.noAmmo: Failed to fire your weapon, no bullets left.
chatText.noAmmoPosessing: You do not have any ammunitions in your inventory. Failed to proceed.
chatText.notSufficientAmmo: You do not have a sufficent amount of bullets in your weapon to use this burst attack, this test cannot be performed.
chatText.possibilityTooltip: Hold SHIFT to roll Possibility without a minimum of 10
chatText.mayCauseContradiction: Perks with this symbol are dependent on their cosm’s World Laws and can cause Contradictions outside that cosm.
chatText.ammoFull: The weapon "{a}" is already fully loaded.

combat.toggleDramatic: Toggle between Standard and Dramatic Combat Resolution
combat.toggleWaiting: Toggle the Wait state of this combatant
combat.hasPlayedTooltip: Check when character's turn is complete

core.forceDarkModeHint: TORG only works with Applications set to Dark mode

defeat.tempInjury: You suffer a temporary Injury. {attribute} is reduced by an effect (minus 1)
defeat.permInjury: You suffer a permanent Injury. {attribute} has been reduced by 1

good-success.sub: You suffer an Injury that lasts until all Wounds are healed

failure.sub: You get one final, dramatic action before expiring (ignoring wound penalties)

mishap.sub: You get one final, dramatic action before expiring (ignoring wound penalties)

dialogPrompts.return: Devuelve todas las cartas a sus mazos. NO baraja automáticamente los mazos.

externalLinks.content: ¿Necesitas ayuda? ¿Quieres informar de un error? Aquí tienes algunos enlaces que te pueden servir.
externalLinks.title: Enlaces

hideForeignCompendium.content: Oculta los compendios oficiales que no están en su idioma.
hideForeignCompendium.title: ocultar compendios de lenguas extranjeras?

itemDeletion.content: ¿Estás seguro que quieres borrar esto? Será eliminado permanentemente de la hoja.
itemDeletion.title: Confirma Borrar

raceDeletion.content: Are you sure you want to delete this? It will be permanently removed from the sheet and all racial perks will be deleted as well.
raceDeletion.title: Confirm Deletion

chooseAmmo.maintext: Please choose the ammunition you want to use to reload your weapon.

dragDropDriver.maintext: Does this character want to drive this vehicle?

showingDramaCards.nbCardsValue: Number of cards to show to player

cardRetour.cardOwner: Who will get the card back ?

buffMacro.choose: Which attribute do you want to modify ?
buffMacro.value: Choose the value for the bonus

raceDiminishAttribute.maintext: El atributo {attribute} es mayor que el máximo poblacional. ¿Debe fijarse el atributo en el máximo poblacional?
raceDiminishAttribute.title: Advertencia, atributo máximo

drama.flurryDesc: FLURRY: {faction} get an extra turn this round
drama.upDesc: UP: Add an additional roll to the first roll for {faction}
drama.confusedDesc: CONFUSED: Players are unable to play cards from their pool
drama.fatiguedDesc: FATIGUED: Two shock inflicted at the end of each {faction} turn
drama.setbackDesc: SETBACK: GM decides a suitable setback for {faction}
drama.stymiedDesc: STYMIED: All {faction} are stymied until the end of the their turn
drama.surgeDesc: SURGE: All {faction} must check for Contradications

itemTraits.label: Traits
itemTraits.hint: The specific abilities of this item

gmScreen.noScreenMessage: you don't have selected any gm screen. The gm screens are provided by the modules that you can find here:
gmScreen.title: GM screen

notifications.dramaDeckEmpty: The Drama Deck is empty. Reset the Drama Deck to continue.
notifications.macroTypeWarning: You can only create macro buttons for owned Items and Attributes/Skills
notifications.migrationRunning: Migración de la versión del sistema Torg a
notifications.moduleNotActive: Activate the module to see desscription.
notifications.noActiveEffectInOwnedItem: Managing Active Effects within an Owned Item is not currently supported and will be added in a subsequent update.
notifications.noAttrNamed: Your controlled Actor does not have an attribute named
notifications.noItemNamed: Your controlled Actor does not have an item named
notifications.noRaceToDelete: There is no race to delete.
notifications.noSkillNamed: Your controlled Actor does not have a skill named
notifications.noTokenNorActor: No tokens selected and no assigned character found, the macro cannot proceed.
notifications.noVehicleOperator: The targeted vehicle {a} doesn't have an operator. The test cannot proceed.
notifications.onlyReservedCard: Please play a reserved card while playing a dramatic scene
notifications.openDiscord: Your browser will open a new page to join us on our discord server
notifications.openIssue: Your browser will open a new page to complete an issue
notifications.openReference: Your browser will open a new page to join the Torg Reference website
notifications.openUlisses: Your browser will open a new tab to join Ulisses website
notifications.failureBDResolution: The system failed to resolute the BD
notifications.ammoValueExceedsMax: The actual ammo value of the weapon {a} exceeds it's max value. The value will be reduced to it's maximum.
notifications.noCapacity: {a} can't pilote this kind of vehicle!
notifications.raceExistent: You have already chosen a race.
notifications.notAPerkItem: Has intentado asignar una ventaja de la categoría {a} a esta raza, pero debe pertenecer a la categoría racial. La acción ha sido abortada.
notifications.reachedMaximumAttr: Has alcanzado el máximo de atributo especificado por tu raza. No es posible aumentar más
notifications.clipEmpty: Esta munición está vacía y no puede utilizarse para recargar.

partySheet.chooseParty:
If you choose YES, it will open with all characters.
If you choose NO, it'll open only active characters.
partySheet.noCharacter: This user doesn't own any actor

animatedChat.hint: Activo: se muestra un efecto de animación en las tarjetas del chat. AVISO: Esto fuerza que la aplicación se vuelva a cargar.
animatedChat.name: Animación Tarjetas del Chat

useColorBlindnessColors.hint: If activated, the game uses daltonistism friendly red and green colors.
useColorBlindnessColors.name: Use daltonism (colorblind)- friendly colors

useRenderedTorgDice.hint: Si está marcada, los cubos de las cartas de chat reciben un recubrimiento Torg. Si no, son de color gris estándar.
useRenderedTorgDice.name: Mostrar cubos Torg en tarjetas de chat

autoDamages.hint: If checked, shocks and wounds would be automatically apply if player has a valid target token. WARNING: This feature only works correctly with initial damage rolls. It will not correctly record subsequent bonus die rolls. Use with caution.
autoDamages.name: Apply damages automatically

deckSetting.hint: Configure the names that are used for your card decks and discard piles.
deckSetting.label: Default card deck configuration
deckSetting.name: Default card deck configuration

disableXP.hint: If checked, only GM should be able to fill XP in character sheet.
disableXP.name: Disabling the XP input for players

gmScreen.hint: Permite seleccionar una pantalla para el DJ de los módulos activos de TORG. Si se selecciona un módulo que no esta instalado la función no funcionará correctamente. AVISO: Es necesario refrescar el navegador (F5) depués del cambio.
gmScreen.name: Selecciona la Pantalla del DJ

hideForeignCompendium.hint: Select to hide all compendium in foreign language
hideForeignCompendium.name: Hide foreign Compendiums

pauseMedia.hint: Escoge la imagen que se mostrará cuando el juego sea pausado.
pauseMedia.name: Imagen de Pausa

playerHandBottom.hint: Player hands open at the bottom right of the screen, and cards will appear above the player hand window. Requires screen refresh (F5) to take effect.
playerHandBottom.name: Player Hand Bottom Display

setupCards.hint: Activo: el sistema hace un reinicio de los mazos y pilas de descarte en la pestaña de Cartas. AVISO: Es necesario refrescar el navegador (F5) para que los cambios se activen.
setupCards.name: Reiniciar las Cartas

showCheckDetails.hint: If checked, the details of checks will always be shown.
showCheckDetails.name: Show Details in checks

welcome.hint: Activo: el mensaje de bienvenida se mostrará después de cargar el mundo.
welcome.name: Mostrar Mensaje Bienvenida

uniqueDN.hint: If checked, when a multi-target test is done, will keep the highest DN from all targets to determine outcome, as RAW.
uniqueDN.name: Unique DN

unTarget.hint: Targets are reseted after an attack by default. Uncheck if you want to keep them.
unTarget.name: Cancel targeting

useYear1PPTent.hint: Use the Pan-Pacifica tabletent after year 1.
useYear1PPTent.name: Year-1 PP TT

cardChatNotify.hint: Hides core Foundry card messages where Torg Eternity supplies its own message
cardChatNotify.name: Suppress Core Card Messages

shuffleMessageSurpress.hint: If checked, the Chat Message on shuffling cards will be surpressed.
shuffleMessageSurpress.name: Supress Chatmessage on shuffle

ignoreAmmo.hint: If checked, rules and mechanics for reloading Ammo are totally ignored.
ignoreAmmo.name: Ignore ammo mechanics

hoverDistance.hint: If checked, hovering the mouse over a token will display the distance to that token from the user's controlled character
hoverDistance.name: Show Distance to Token

rulerGridWalk.hint: The tint colour for grid cells when a token has not reached its move distance (default: --color-level-success)
rulerGridWalk.name: Grid Highlight (Walk)

rulerGridRun.hint: The tint colour for grid cells when a token has exceeded its move, but not its max move (default: --color-level-info)
rulerGridRun.name: Grid Highlight (Run)

rulerGridMax.hint: The tint colour for grid cells when a token has exceeded its max move (default: --color-level-error)
rulerGridMax.name: Grid Highlight (> Run)

showMovementRuler.hint: Displays the movement history of tokens during a combat round (history is cleared on a new round)
showMovementRuler.name: Show Token Movement History

autoShock.name: Automatically Apply KO
autoShock.hint: Automatically set an actor to unconscious whenever their shock is exceeded

autoWound.name: Automatically Apply Wounds
autoWound.hint: Automatically set a threat or vehicle token to Dead when its wounds are exceeded

autoDisconnect.name: Automatically Disconnect
autoDisconnect.hint: On a Surge or Test check that causes Disconnection, the actor will automatically be set to disconnected

dramaCardUp.name: UP only from Drama Card
dramaCardUp.hint: Hide the UP button in Test Check results if the current Drama Card doesn't have UP in the conflict line (default true)

sheetLabels.allOutTooltip: +4 Bonus/Very Vulnerable (Melee and unarmed attacks only)
sheetLabels.applyDamageTooltip: Right-click to modify applied damages, Left-click to apply.
sheetLabels.applyStymiedTooltip: Click to apply Stymied. Or Very Stymied if already Stymied.
sheetLabels.applyVulnerableTooltip: Click to apply Vulnerable. Or Very Vulnerable if already Vulnerable.
sheetLabels.blindFireTooltip: Location of target only generally known
sheetLabels.coverBonusTooltip: Bonus added to target toughness as a result of cover
sheetLabels.crewUnskilledOperator: The operator of this vehicle is unskilled!
sheetLabels.crewUnskilledWeapon: This weapon is being used unskilled!
sheetLabels.crewFavored: This weapon has a favored gunner
sheetLabels.customSkill: Custom skills can be edited in the Perks tab
sheetLabels.defensesTip: Click to roll for/disable active defenses
sheetLabels.editableTooltip: expand the threat sheet to display editable fields
sheetLabels.enhancementTooltip: Check if enhancement has been selected by Storm Knight
sheetLabels.enhancementAddTooltip: Add available enhancement to end of list
sheetLabels.explosionCancelled: You were disfavored, first bonus die has been cancelled, but you're no more disfavored.
sheetLabels.favoredTitle: Check this if the skill is favored
sheetLabels.inputExistingTooltip: Choose whether to (1) roll for a bonus number or (2) input a previously generated bonus when attempting a multi-action.
sheetLabels.inputExistingTitle: Input BONUS NUMBER from previous test, not die total.
sheetLabels.lastPossMess:
This is your last possibility, do you confirm ?
Are You Sure ?
sheetLabels.limitationsAddTooltip: Add available limitation to end of list
sheetLabels.modifyDamage: You can modify the damages here.
sheetLabels.name: Name
sheetLabels.noPossFree:
No possibility !
Do you confirm the gift ?
sheetLabels.removeGunner: Remove this gunner from this weapon
sheetLabels.removeOperator: Remove the operator from the vehicle
sheetLabels.soakAll: You will soak all wounds and shocks.
sheetLabels.soakDamageTooltip: Generate a Reality skill roll, and gives the damages reduction.
sheetLabels.trademarkHint: Trademark Weapon Perk for the used weapon
sheetLabels.usePreviousBonusLegend: Choose whether to (1) roll for a bonus number or (2) input a previously generated bonus when attempting a multi-action.
sheetLabels.usePreviousBonustitle: When engaged in multi-actions, check this box to input the bonus number from a previous test.
sheetLabels.usePreviousBonusText: Input BONUS NUMBER from previous test, not die total.
sheetLabels.toolTipClickToAdd: pulse para añadir o eliminar la competencia de la lista de acceso
sheetLabels.bonusDice: Tirada de dados de bonificación por adelantado

skillDialogs.disfavoredTip: Check if this test is disfavored. The die roll will not explode on a 10 or 20.
skillDialogs.favoredTip: Check if this test is favored for some unexpected reason.

macros.commonMacroNoTokensSelected: No se ha seleccionado ninguna ficha. La macro no puede ejecutarse.
macros.commonMacroNoCharacter: No puedo encontrar un personaje para continuar.
macros.commonMacroNoValue: No se ha introducido ningún valor. La macro no puede ejecutarse.
macros.commonMacroOnlyByGM: ¡Esta macro sólo puede ser ejecutada por game masters!
macros.commonMacroNoChatMessageFound: No se ha podido interceptar ningún mensaje de chat, se cancela el procesamiento posterior.
macros.fatigueMacroDealtDamage: Los siguientes personajes han sufrido un shock:
macros.fatigueMacroCharAlreadyKO: ¡ya está noqueado! Más choque no es posible.
macros.reviveMacroError1: No se ha introducido nada en el campo de la cantidad y la casilla de verificación no está marcada. ¿Qué debo hacer? Cancelar.
macros.reviveMacroFirst: Los siguientes personajes se recuperan del shock:
macros.reviveMacroAlreadyFull: ¡ya está bien y no tiene sobresaltos!
macros.reviveMacroCharPartyRevived: se curó en la siguiente cantidad:
macros.reviveMacroCharDeKOed: Se ha anulado el estatuto de nocaut para
macros.clearStatusEffectsHeadline: Se han cancelado los estatus de los siguientes personajes:
macros.clearStatusEffectsNothingFound: No se han encontrado estados para las fichas seleccionadas.
macros.bonusDieMacroContent: ¿Cuántos dados de bonificación hay que tirar?
macros.bonusDieMacroErrorIntegerValue: La entrada no era un número entero. Por favor, introduzca un número entero.
macros.bonusDieMacroNoTokenTargeted: No se llevaron fichas a la meta.
macros.reconnectMacroZoneModifierNotDetected: No se ha podido detectar un modificador de zona porque la escena activa no tiene zonas configuradas. Cambie el modificador en el resultado.
macros.reconnectMacroStatusLiftet: Estado desacoplado cancelado tras una comprobación de la realidad satisfactoria.
